Package com.tacticalenterprisesltd

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BasicOutput
    This interface is being implemented by SSPOutput and NonSSPOutput because the "data" class member resides in both classes and I wanted Polymorphic capabilities through this interface which I use in the Join class.
    DbClean
    This interface is to be used in conjunction with the Upload class.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Column  
    ColumnOrder  
    Constants
    Global constants
    CreateEditDeleteOutput
    This class contains the members required to return a response to the client side whenever all processing (filtering, pagination, etc.) is performed on the client side.
    Database
    The Database class performs all the necessary functions required to SELECT, UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE records.
    This class supports the following database management systems: MySql (default) v5.0 or higher Oracle v12c or higher SQL Server v2012 or higher
    DateFormat
    This class allows you to set a Field of type DATE to a specific date format.
    Editor
    DataTables Editor base class for creating editable tables.
    Field
    To create an instance of this class you can add instances of class Validate and DateFormat like so:

    Field field = new Field("TableName","ColumnName","JSonName");
    String[] arguments = new String[]{DateFormat.DATE_ISO_822};
    field.setValidator(new Validate(Validate.Type.DATE_FORMAT, arguments));
    field.setDateFormat(new DateFormat(field, DateFormat.DATE_ISO_822));
    Minimally, you need to provide both the Table name and the Column name of the field for the database when invoking any of the constructors.
    FieldErrorsOutput
    This class contains the members required to return a response to the client side whenever there is a FieldError during the validation phase over all Fields.
    Join
    The Join class is used to include additional fields from another database table to the main parent table for display in DataTables.
    Main  
    NonSSPOutput
    This class contains the members required to return a response to the client side whenever all processing (filtering, pagination, etc.) is performed on the client side.
    Order
    This class is used as part of the query whereby you need to indicate for an ORDER BY clause the Field name and the direction of the order: "asc" or "desc"
    Parameters
    This class contains all the parameters passed to the server side from DataTables on the client side.
    Query
    The Query class is used internally by an instance of Editor.
    SQLInsertionAttackObservable
    This class allows you to monitor SQL Insertion Attack alerts.
    SSPOutput
    This class contains the members required to return a response to the client side whenever all processing (filtering, pagination, etc.) is performed on the server side.
    Upload
    Use this class to upload files.
    UploadOutput
    This class contains the members required to return a response to the client side whenever files are uploaded to the server.
    Validate
    An instance of this class is used by a Field to ensure the user on the client side is providing valid data on an Edit or Create form.
    ValidationMessage
    This class contains a message to be returned to the client side if there is an error during the validation phase.
    WhereCondition
    Use this class to set conditions on a WHERE clause for a query.
    WhereConditionGroups
    Use this class to group two or more WhereCondition(s) with logical operators AND, OR.
